queries.queryString:
_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Code_Scanning_Alerts

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created")
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url" , "repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Secret_Scanning_Alerts

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("create") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Dependabot_Alerts

_source="GitHub"
| where action in ("created","create")
| json "alert.created_at" as alert
| json "alert.external_identifier" as Dependabot nodrop   
| json "commit_oid" as CodeScanning nodrop
| json "commit_oid" as CodeScanning nodrop
| json "repository.full_name"  as repo_name nodrop
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| if(!isNull(Dependabot), 1 , 0) as Dep_alerts
| if(!isNull(CodeScanning), 1 , 0) as Code_alerts
| if(!isNull(SecretScanning), 1 , 0) as Secret_alerts
| sum (Code_alerts) as Code_Alerts, sum(Dep_alerts) as Dep_Alerts,sum(Secret_alerts) as Secret_Alerts
| count by Code_Alerts, Dep_Alerts, Secret_Alerts
| (Code_Alerts+ Dep_Alerts + Secret_Alerts ) as Total
| fields Total

_source="GitHub"
| where action in ("created","create")
| json "alert.created_at" , "repository.full_name" as alert, repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by repo_name
| sort by _count

_source="GitHub"
| where action in ("created", "create")
| json "alert.created_at" , "repository.full_name" as alert, repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parse "severity*" as severity nodrop
| if (severity matches /"(low)"/i ,1,0) as low
| if (severity matches /"(medium)"/i ,1,0) as medium
| if (severity matches /"(moderate)"/i ,1,0) as moderate
| if (severity matches /"(high)"/i ,1,0) as high
| if (severity matches /"(critical)"/i ,1,0) as critical
| if (severity matches /"(critical||high|moderate|medium|low)"/i ,0,1) as secret_scanning_high
| sum (low) as Total_low, sum (medium) as Total_medium,  sum (moderate) as Total_moderate,  sum (high) as Total_high, sum (critical) as Total_critical, sum (secret_scanning_high) as Total_secret_scanning_alerts
| Total_low as Low
| Total_medium as Medium
| Total_moderate as Moderate 
| (Total_secret_scanning_alerts +  Total_high ) as High
| Total_critical as Critical
| fields Low, Medium, Moderate, High, Critical

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("closed_by_user", "fixed") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Code_Scanning_Alerts

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolved")
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url" , "repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Secret_Scanning_Alerts

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("dismiss", "resolve") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count as Dependabot_Alerts

_source="GitHub"
| where action in ("closed_by_user", "fixed", "resolved", "resolve", "dismiss" ) 
| json "alert.created_at" as alert
| json "alert.external_identifier" as Dependabot nodrop   
| json "commit_oid" as CodeScanning nodrop
| json "alert.secret_type" as SecretScanning nodrop
| json "repository.full_name"  as repo_name nodrop
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| if(!isNull(Dependabot), 1 , 0) as Dep_alerts
| if(!isNull(CodeScanning) and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != "", 1 , 0) as Code_alerts
| if(!isNull(SecretScanning), 1 , 0) as Secret_alerts
| sum (Code_alerts) as Code_Alerts, sum(Dep_alerts) as Dep_Alerts,sum(Secret_alerts) as Secret_Alerts
| count by Code_Alerts, Dep_Alerts, Secret_Alerts
| (Code_Alerts+ Dep_Alerts + Secret_Alerts ) as Total
| fields Total

_source="GitHub"
| where action in ("create", "dismiss", "resolve", "created", "reopened_by_user", "closed_by_user", "fixed", "appeared_in_branch", "reopened")
| json "alert.created_at" , "repository.full_name" as alert, repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| action as Status
| alert as Created_at

| json "alert.rule.security_severity_level" as Sev_1 nodrop
| json "alert.severity" as Sev_2 nodrop
| !isNull(Sev_1) ? Sev_1 : Sev_2 as Severity_3
| !isNull(Severity_3) ? Severity_3 : "high" as Severity

| json "alert.affected_package_name" as Reason_1 nodrop
| json "alert.rule.name" as Reason_2 nodrop
| json "alert.secret_type" as Reason_3 nodrop

| !isNull(Reason_1) ? Reason_1 : Reason_2 as Reason_4
| !isNull(Reason_4) ? Reason_4 : Reason_3 as Reason

| json "alert.ghsa_id" as ID_1 nodrop
| json "alert.rule.id" as ID_2 nodrop
| json "alert.number" as ID_3 nodrop
| !isNull(ID_1) ? ID_1 : ID_2 as ID_4
| !isNull(ID_4) ? ID_4 : ID_3 as ID

| json "alert.external_identifier" as Dependabot nodrop 
| !isNull(Dependabot) ? "Dependabot_alert" : "" as DependabotAlert 
| !isNull(commit_oid) ? "CodeScanning" : "" as CodeScanningAlert
| !isNull(Reason_3) ? "SecretScanning" : "" as SecretScanningAlert
| !isEmpty(DependabotAlert) ? DependabotAlert : CodeScanningAlert as AlertType
| !isEmpty(AlertType) ? AlertType : SecretScanningAlert as Type

|where !isEmpty(Reason)
|count by repo_name,  Reason, ID, Type, Severity, Status, Created_at
|fields repo_name,  Reason, ID, Type, Severity, Status, Created_at

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("reopened") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("fixed") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created", "fixed") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("fixed", "closed_by_user") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "alert.created_at", " alert.fixed_at", "repository.full_name" as Created, Resolved, repo_name 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as Start
| parseDate(Resolved, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as End
| (End - Start) as Duration
| avg(Duration) as avg_time
|format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((avg_time/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),round((avg_time/(1000*60*60))%24,2),round((avg_time/(1000*60))%60, 2) ,round((avg_time/1000)%60),2) as MTTR
| fields MTTR

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created", "appeared_in_branch") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name", "alert.tool.name" as repo_name, tool
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count by tool, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column tool

_source="GitHub"
| json "commits[0].added",  "commits[0].modified", "repository.full_name"  as commit_added, commit_modified, repo_name
| where commit_added!="" or commit_modified != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| "Push" as commits
| timeslice 1d
| count as Pushes by _timeslice

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created", "reopened") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name" as repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| "Code Scanning Alert" as alerts
| timeslice 1d
| count as Alerts by _timeslice

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("closed_by_user", "fixed") and !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name", "alert.tool.name", "alert.html_url", "alert.created_at", "alert.fixed_at" as repo_name, Tool, URL, Created, Resolved
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseStart
| isNull(Resolved) ? Created : Resolved as End
| parseDate(End, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseEnd
| tourl(URL, URL) as URL
| (parseEnd - parseStart) as duration
| duration != 0 ? format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60))%24,2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60))%60, 2)) ,round((duration/1000)%60),2) : "null" as %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| count by repo_name, Tool, URL, Created, Resolved, %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| fields repo_name, Tool, URL, Created, Resolved, %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created", "reopened_by_user", "reopened") 
| where !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "alert.rule.security_severity_level","repository.full_name" as Severity, repo_name
| where !isNull(Severity) and Severity != "" 
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by repo_name, Severity
| transpose row repo_name column Severity

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created", "reopened") 
| where !isNull(commit_oid) and commit_oid != ""
| json "repository.full_name",  "alert.tool.name" as repo_name, Tool
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by repo_name,Tool
| transpose row repo_name column Tool

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolve") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "alert.created_at", "alert.fixed_at",  "repository.full_name" as identifier, Created, Resolved, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as Start
| parseDate(Resolved, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as End
| (End - Start) as Duration
| avg(Duration) as avg_time
|format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((avg_time/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),round((avg_time/(1000*60*60))%24,2),round((avg_time/(1000*60))%60, 2) ,round((avg_time/1000)%60),2) as MTTR
| fields MTTR

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("dismiss", "create", "resolve") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("create") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name", "alert.severity" as identifier, repo_name, severity
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where !isNull(severity) and severity != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, severity
| transpose row _timeslice column severity

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("create") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by repo_name

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("create") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

| where action in ("resolve") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("dismiss") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "repository.full_name" as identifier, repo_name 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolve", "dismiss") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "alert.created_at", "alert.fixed_at", "alert.external_reference", "repository.full_name" , "alert.severity" as identifier, Created, Resolved, URL, repo_name, Severity 
| action as Status
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseStart
| isNull(Resolved) ? Created : Resolved as End
| parseDate(End, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseEnd
| tourl(URL, URL) as URL
| (parseEnd - parseStart) as duration
| duration != 0 ? format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60))%24,2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60))%60, 2)) ,round((duration/1000)%60),2) : "null" as %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| count by Status, repo_name, Severity, URL,  %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| fields Status, repo_name, Severity, URL,  %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolve", "dismiss") 
| json "alert.external_identifier", "alert.created_at", "alert.fixed_at", "alert.external_reference", "repository.full_name" , "alert.severity" as identifier, Created, Resolved, URL, repo_name, severity 
| where !isNull(identifier) and identifier != ""
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by repo_name, severity
| transpose row repo_name column severity

| where action in ("created") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url" , "repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("created") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url" , "repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| count by Secret

| where action in ("created", "resolved") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url","repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, action

| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url" , "repository.full_name" as Secret, URL, repo_name

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolved") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "alert.html_url", "alert.created_at", " alert.resolved_at","repository.full_name"  as Secret, URL,Created, Resolved, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as Start
| parseDate(Resolved, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as End
| (End - Start) as Duration
| avg(Duration) as avg_time
|format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((avg_time/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),round((avg_time/(1000*60*60))%24,2),round((avg_time/(1000*60))%60, 2) ,round((avg_time/1000)%60),2) as MTTR
| fields MTTR

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolved") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "organization.login", "repository.name","alert.resolution", "alert.html_url", "alert.created_at", " alert.resolved_at", "repository.full_name" as Secret, Organization, Repository, Resolution, URL ,Created, Resolved, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| parseDate(Created, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseStart
| isNull(Resolved) ? Created : Resolved as End
| parseDate(End, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss") as parseEnd
| (parseEnd - parseStart) as duration
| duration != 0 ? format("%s : %s : %s : %s",floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60*24)),2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60*60))%24,2)),floor(round((duration/(1000*60))%60, 2)) ,round((duration/1000)%60),2) : "null" as %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| count by Secret, Organization, Repository ,Resolution,%"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"
| fields Secret, Organization, Repository, Resolution, %"Resolution Time(dd-hh-mm-ss)"

_source="GitHub" 
| where action in ("resolved") 
| json "alert.secret_type", "organization.login", "repository.name","alert.resolution", "alert.html_url", "alert.created_at", " alert.resolved_at", "repository.full_name" as Secret, Organization, Repository, Resolution, URL ,Created, Resolved, repo_name
| where repo_name matches "{{Repository}}"
| tourl(URL, URL) as URL
| count by Secret, Organization, Repository,URL, Created
| fields Secret, Organization, Repository, URL, Created
